channel.title: SRL Original *leet traitors* TUT!
channel.description:
Ok here it is a tut made by a noob for noobs
ok first up you need the newes version of SRL
http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/SRL201.rar
helpful post
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3617.0.html
Ok i'm assuming that you know that you need to have the SRL file in your includes file and that you know how to do this and your not a complete idiot.
Ok first ting first
you open scar and you get this
[code]program New; begin end. [/code]
what you want to do is add the includes so add them by adding
[code]{.include SRL/SRL.scar} [/code]
ok you should haave something that looks like this
[code]program New; {.include SRL/SRL.scar} begin end. [/code]
ok now for the good part i will know run over some basic functions
[code]Mmouse(x,x,y,y); [/code]
ok the "x" ar the coridinates you want to go to and the "y" Is a random point area, so if you say
[code]Mmouse(25,200,5,5); [/code]
it will move to 25,500 and have a random of 5 arround 25,500. I you change the second 5 to 10
[code]Mmouse(25,200,5,10); [/code]
the 25 will have a random of 5 and the 200 will have a random of 10
so in fulkl you should have
[code]program New; {.include SRL/SRL.scar} begin Mmouse(25,200,5,10); end. [/code]
Thats pretty much my tut
hope it helped, i'd like some feedback

item.title: SRL Original *leet traitors* TUT!
item.dc:creator: @inferno inferno
item.description:
@inferno wrote:

[quote=“traitors, post:1, topic:3344”]i learnt most of my stuff from the manual here

C:\Documents and Settings\Allen\Local Settings\Temp\Rar$EX03.906\SRL\SRL.html

just have a look around and try some other functions there[/quote]

Like wow… that made my day. That is a location on your computer not a link so we can’t access it.

Oh and remember you need SetUpSrl; at the start of your main loop.

Read full topic

item.title: SRL Original *leet traitors* TUT!
item.dc:creator: @traitors traitors
item.description:
@traitors wrote:

Ok here it is a tut made by a noob for noobs

ok first up you need the newes version of SRL

http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/SRL201.rar

helpful post

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Ok i’m assuming that you know that you need to have the SRL file in your includes file and that you know how to do this and your not a complete idiot.

Ok first ting first

you open scar and you get this

program New; begin end.

what you want to do is add the includes so add them by adding

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

ok you should haave something that looks like this

program New; {.include SRL/SRL.scar} begin end.

ok now for the good part i will know run over some basic functions

Mmouse(x,x,y,y);

ok the “x” ar the coridinates you want to go to and the “y” Is a random point area, so if you say

Mmouse(25,200,5,5);

it will move to 25,500 and have a random of 5 arround 25,500. I you change the second 5 to 10

Mmouse(25,200,5,10);

the 25 will have a random of 5 and the 200 will have a random of 10

so in fulkl you should have

program New; {.include SRL/SRL.scar} begin Mmouse(25,200,5,10); end.

Thats pretty much my tut

hope it helped, i’d like some feedback

Read full topic
